name: Bragi
holysymbol: A quill on paper writing flourished words.
appearance: Appears as a quill pen that writes in the air
tenets: Dance with the truth, but never tell it outright.
Weave lies for entertainment and wonder, not to harm.
Glorify everything, heroes and villains alike.
Make the world awe in wonder at the world itself.
parents: 3rd Generation, born of Dorun and Nera
lore: For centuries, Bragi has been in love with Labious, and has attempted to woe her with poetry and wits. She is not amused.
